ui.gui.graphical.game

Class TiledImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.gui.graphical.game.TiledImage

  • public class TiledImage
extends java.lang.Object
    An image with multiple tiles, backed up by a BufferedImage.

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage GetTile(int col,

        Gets the tile at position (col, line) Multiple calls to this method with the same arguments will NOT load the image multiple times, only once (cached).

        line - the line

        the buffered image
